item.description: Well, since Jose Mac's randomly and unexpectedly canceled their trivia nights on Wednesdays (Shenanigans!), I'm going to try to put a team together for TUESDAY trivia nights at Clarke's. I used to do this weekly with a regular team, but my team was annihilated by moves-out-of-state and/or significant-other-acquisition. So, I'll put this on here in case anyone wants to join me TOMORROW, Tuesday, for Stump! trivia at Clarke's. Note the early start time. ;) Means we get DONE early. ;) Clarke's has a $3 beer special and a great pub menu. NOTE: Trivia is in the BACK bar area. Ask bartender for me, they all know me. Hope to see you there! If I can get a good team going, we can do this EVERY week.
item.how_to_find_us: will be sitting at bar, ask bartender for me.
item.name: Trivia Night at Clarke's Faneuil Hall
